response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your business. I am extending an exclusive offer to you for $15,000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity to secure it at a special rate. I look forward to hearing your decision.", "product_price": 15000}
